title: Kaley Cuoco sends late present to The Big Bang Theory cast
text:
Kaley Cuoco sends late present to The Big Bang Theory cast (Picture: Getty Images)

The Big Bang Theory came to an end back in May this year.

But despite wrapping up filming almost six whole months ago, Penny star Kaley Cuoco has only just sent out her farewell presents.

However, it sounds as though they were worth the wait.

When chatting on The Kelly Clarkson Show, the 33-year-old revealed what she made for her buddies, and it’s too much.

She told the host: ‘For 12 years on Big Bang I must have taken about 2,000 Polaroids of the cast…

She told Kelly Clarkson all about it (Picture: Getty Images)

It sounds as though it was worth the wait (Picture: CBS)

‘So when we wrapped my sister and I put all the Polaroids onto a hard drive and sent it to the cast and crew.’

The star added: ‘They just got it a few weeks ago, so they started texting me, like, “I got the pictures!”‘

Advertisement

Advertisement

And it seems she is still pining over the show, as the popular actress went onto confess that she’ll still watch the occasional episode – like us all.

‘It is on a lot and so I’ll be flipping channels and once in a while I will turn it on,’ Kaley said.

Johnny Galecki is also pining over the show (Picture: WireImage)

‘If it’s an older episode, I don’t even look like myself and I feel like I don’t even sound like myself.’

She laughed: ‘I went through a lot of changes – a lot of hair, a lot of different clothes.’

And she’s not the only one who is missing the show, as he co-star Johnny Galecki recently shared a throwback to the 100th episode.

Writing to his three million followers, the Leonard Hofstadter star congratulated director Mark Cendrowski, on his Emmy success.

The actor said: ‘#FBF to the 100th episode celebration of @bigbangtheory_cbs w/ currently Emmy nominated resident director, #markcendrowski and day-player, @kaleycuoco. Congratulations, Coach. Well deserved. XO.’

The Big Bang Theory is available to stream now on Netflix.

description: Kaley Cuoco sends late present to The Big Bang Theory cast but it's worth the wait.
